#summary Cancel nights for an existing booking.

== Synopsis ==
Guest requests booked nights be cancelled. This could be a from a guest who has already checked in (and already paid for the nights) or from a future booking (hasn't arrived yet).

== Process ==

  # Click Bookings.
  # Enter name/reservation number and set date to start date of booking. Click Search.
  # Find reservation. Click Edit.
  # For each of the guests under Allocations, toggle the state of the nights to cancel to available (not coloured). If the night is non-refundable, then toggle state to (C)ancelled. (Issue refund as required)
  # Click save.
